p: Moreover, in a study of photo respiratory pathway alteration by Origanum vulgare EOs in A. thaliana, Araniti et al. [ 59] suggested that alteration of glutamate and aspartate metabolism leads to leaf chlorosis and necrosis. Glutamine synthetase is crucial to incorporate ammonia in organic compounds and may be a molecular target of O. vulgare EO. Finally, ammonia accretion has direct inhibiting properties on PSI and PSII due to its bonding with the oxygen-evolving complex. In addition, the decrease in pH gradients across membranes is able to uncouple photophosphorylation.
